entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:03 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 10:03 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:03 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
